text: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions he had money as well.
author: Margaret Thatcher

text: I'm sick of giving creeps money off my soul.
author: Bob Dylan

text: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
author: Henry Ford

text: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
author: Barack Obama
